title: Blood is life
creator_credit: Basic Films and Great Britain. Ministry of Health
brief_description: Illustrates the work of Britain’s National Blood Transfusion Service. Shows how highly-trained personnel safeguard the health of donors and patients, by scrupulous care of equipment and checking of records. Describes the care with which blood is classified and stored, and how it finally reaches the patient in the operating theatre.
